A uses his [[Hell Stab]] and smashes his hand into the ground, creating several pillars of earth from the impact. Then, the Raikage uses one finger to create a spear covered in lightning and enters the [[Lightning Release Chakra Mode]]. Using his finger, he strikes the opponent, creating a gigantic shock of lightning and dealing great damage to the opponent.
